paragraphs: We scavenged all the old mirrors we could carry out of Leyawiin. Is this many reflective surfaces really necessary? And do those birds actually talk? Are they even really birds? I suppose the mirrors do keep them quiet and occupied. Without them, hose things never shut up.

I struggle to understand how these creatures are fundamental to our plans. But if they are, as you say, the key to opening doors into the Evergloam, then all of this polishing and sweeping up of broken glass will be well worth it.
